posts.content:
The Versatile Arcane Warrior

Image source: https://www.gamersdecide.com/sites/defa ... pons_1.jpg

This was another interesting build concept:

- Strength based Arcane Archer to be good at both melee and ranged
- Bard / RDD to boost stats, great skill dumps and immunities
- Elf for keen senses, early weapon proficiencies

It ends up with:
38 Str (capped at 50), Dex 16 (capped at 28), mundane melee AB 44, mundane ranged AB 44 (with +11 enchanted arrows which can penetrate stoneskins/premonition early epic levels)
Combat feats blind fight, knockdown, point blank shot, IC: Greatsword
Gets +4 AC from RDD, +2 AC from armor skin, +8 AC from tumble, +2-9 dex AC in chainmail - robes
428 hp (668 hp capped), Fort 28 / Will 21 / Reflex 24 (+6 to saves against spells +2 against mind effects)
Bard level 3 spell casting, Bard 8 song, 257 skill points for discipline, UMD, tumble, taunt (-6 AC to enemies), spellcraft 

Fire immune, paralysis immune, sleep immune, dark vision

I don't go dev crit melee or dual dev crit melee + ranged but it could be done. It is very expensive, costing 6-9 feats (blind fight, knockdown, toughness, rapid shot, two great strengths for PA, Cleave, Great Cleave, then for each weapon IC, OC, DC), I don't think it would be as fun. 



Image source: https://i.pinimg.com/originals/34/07/3d ... 943243.jpg

I thought bard spells could be:
- Lvl 1 Summon I [to bait out enemy spells mostly], Mage Armor, Identify, Prot v Alignment
- Lvl 2 Ultravision, Darkness, Bull's [for the ultravision / darkness combo], Invisibility
- Lvl 3 Keen Edge, Magic Circle v Alignment

Anyway hope this was a fun read, I think this will be fun to play
